items.title: Radhe Shyam
items.description: World-renowned palmist Vikramaditya falls head over heels in love with doctor Prerana on a train journey. However, the lovers must rewrite their destiny and even cheat death to be together.

items.title: Silvat
items.description: Silvat is a 2016 Hindi short film starring Kartik Aaryan and Meher Mistry. The social drama, directed by noted filmmaker Tanuja Chandra, is the story of Noor whose husband takes up a job abroad within the first week of their marriage. As her married life turns into a never-ending wait for her husband, she falls in love with Anwar, a tailor. Will the two express their feelings for each other?

items.title: Dial 100
items.description: Officer Nikhil receives a call from a hysterical woman determined to commit suicide in this ZEE5 Original film. As the call progresses, Nikhil realises that the woman has some dangerous intentions.Dial 100 stars Manoj Bajpayee, Neena Gupta, and Sakshi Tanwar in the lead roles. The police emergency control room receives a call from a troubled woman. As officer Nikhil tries to calm her down, he discovers that the hysterical woman has bought a gun. When asked, she tells him to stay tuned to find out about her real intentions. But as time progresses, Nikhil realises his family is in danger. Watch this fast-paced crime thriller with seasoned actors and witness how the events unfold. Will Nikhil be able to save his family, or will the caller follow through her plan?
items.short_description: Officer Nikhil receives a call from a hysterical woman determined to commit suicide in this ZEE5 Original film. As the call progresses, Nikhil realises that the woman has some dangerous intentions.

items.title: Helmet
items.description: Desperate to make some quick money, Lucky and his friends rob an e-commerce company truck. But to their surprise, the looted boxes contain condoms instead of electronic gadgets. What will Lucky do?

items.title: The Tashkent Files

items.title: Radhe - Your Most Wanted Bhai
items.description: Mumbai is suffering from the wrath of a drug kingpin, and the Police force is falling short of handling the situation. Radhe, a specialist cop, is appointed to bring this situation under control for peace in the city. Being the last hope, will Radhe be able to get everything under control? Watch Radhe movie online on ZEE5 to find out what happens to the city. Radhe: Your Most Wanted Bhai is a Hindi language movie directed by Prabhudeva in which Salman Khan plays the titular role of Rajveer Shikawat aka Radhe. It is produced by Sohail Khan and Reel Life Production Private Limited under the banner of Salman Khan films. The film features an ensemble cast of Jackie Shroff, Randeep Hooda, Disha Patani, Gautam Gulati, Zarina Wahab, and other supporting actors. Watch Radhe full movie online in HD. It is a crime, action movie that will keep you at the edge of your seat. With lots of entertainment and mind-blowing action, you will love Salman Khan in this power-packed avatar and character of Radhe.
items.short_description: Radhe, an invincible cop, is the last hope of a city grappling with drug abuse and overrun by criminals. How far will Radhe go to bring peace to the city? Streaming now!

items.title: Antim: The Final Truth
items.description: A farmer’s son is forced to leave the village and move to the city, where he soon becomes a dreaded gangster and crosses paths with a fearless cop determined to eliminate criminals.
items.short_description: A farmer’s son is forced to leave the village and move to the city, where he soon becomes a dreaded gangster and crosses paths with a fearless cop determined to eliminate criminals.
items.seo_description:
Enjoy Antim: The Final Truth from Anywhere on ZEE5 Today!

Watch Antim movie online on ZEE5 to witness the clash of two different ideologies; one of a cop and the other of a gangster. Antim: The Final Truth is a Hindi language action-thriller starring Salman Khan and Aayush Sharma in titular roles as Inspector Rajveer Singh and Rahul Patil. Based on the 2018 Marathi blockbuster, ‘Mulshi Pattern’, the movie is directed by Mahesh Manjrekar and produced under Salman Khan Films. This action-packed thriller will keep your heart racing from the start and ensure a bloody good time. You can stream ‘Antim: The Final Truth’ on ZEE5 from anywhere in HD and catch the mesmerizing performances of the lead actors from the comfort of your home. So, start streaming Antim on ZEE5 and get ready to be blown away by intense action and numerous twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

items.title: Love Hostel

items.short_description: This ZEE5 original film traces the journey of a spirited young couple, being hunted by a ruthless mercenary. Will the star-crossed lovers find their fairy-tale ending?
items.seo_description:
Watch Crime Thriller 'Love Hostel' on ZEE5!

Love Hostel is a crime thriller with a stellar cast of Vikrant Massey, Sanya Malhotra, and Bobby Deol. With the plot set against the backdrop of rustic North India, the film is written and directed by the talented Shanker Raman. At its heart, the film follows the journey of a spirited young couple hunted by a ruthless mercenary. The Hindi film is co-produced by Drishyam Film and Red Chillies Entertainment and showcases the struggle of love, leading to mayhem and chaos. 

Witness the Magic of Hope and Love in 'Love Hostel' on ZEE5!

If you are on the lookout for a movie with all the entertaining elements, including romance, crime, and thrill, 'Love Hostel' has it all. The film also sheds light on social subjects that educate viewers. It is a tale about finding hope in times of adversity. The film also has a magnetic cast that gives the film an emotional depth, making the narrative even more compelling. The gripping plot will reel you in from the start and keep you on the edge of your seat. 

Stream ZEE5 Original 'Love Hostel' from Your Home Today!

As India's home-grown entertaining platform, ZEE5 has constantly churned out original content to entertain viewers from all walks of life. With 'Love Hostel', ZEE5 brings you a compelling tale about love, money, and power that will get your blood pumping. So, give yourself a well-deserved break and join the thrilling journey of our star-crossed lovers as they fight everyone standing in their way. Just tune in to ZEE5 and stream 'Love Hostel' at any time from your devices.

items.title: State of Siege: Temple Attack
tags: State of Siege Temple Attack zee5 original film
State of Siege Temple Attack zee5 original movie
items.description: Inspired by true events, this ZEE5 Original film narrates the heroic tale of the NSG commandos who step in to save innocent people when terrorists enter a temple in Gujarat and attack them.State Of Siege: Temple Attack is Akshaye Khanna’s OTT debut where he leads a team of NSG Commandos as Major Hanut Singh. Will he be able to successfully rescue all hostages from the temple? To find out, watch SOS: Temple Attack, an edge-of-your-seat thriller.If patriotic and action movies intrigue you like many others, you should surely watch State of Siege: Temple Attack film for experiencing the siege first-hand like no one else.
items.short_description: Inspired by true events, this ZEE5 Original film narrates the heroic tale of the NSG commandos who step in to save innocent people when terrorists enter a temple in Gujarat and attack them.

items.description: This ZEE5 Original film narrates the inspiring story of a small-town girl, who overcomes all societal barriers to become a national-level athlete, but her glory is hindered when she is asked to undergo a gender test.Watch the Taapsee Pannu starrer Rashmi Rocket only on ZEE5. Enjoy this Hindi sports drama inspired by true events.

items.title: 14 Phere
items.description: Vikrant Massey is back on ZEE5 with Kriti Kharbanda and his comic timing in their upcoming romantic comedy, 14 Phere. When Sanjay woos Aditi in college, they fall in love and quickly realise that they are meant to be together. Sanjay and Aditi do not agree that the caste system establishes a cohesive social order. However, their parents do, and they would never give their consent to their marriage.Aditi and Sanjay decide to do something out-of-the-box so they can still get married and do not hurt their parent’s sentiment. See what happens when this madly-in-love couple reaches their limits to spending their lives together. Irrespective of what happens, you will be left with 2x drama and melodrama all in this movie.
items.short_description: This ZEE5 Original movie centres around Sanjay and Aditi, two lovers who hatch a plan to get married since they are unable to convince their conservative parents for the same.

items.title: Bloody Brothers

items.short_description: Two brothers Jaggi and Daljeet run over an old man while driving home late one night. They do everything to cover their tracks, but when people begin to suspect, their lives fall apart.
items.seo_description:
Tighten Your Seatbelts for a Thrilling Ride with Bloody Brothers!

A gripping story with a hint of dark comedy and thriller, ‘Bloody Brothers’ is a tale that tests the relationship between two brothers. When Jaggi Grover and Daljeet Grover, two brothers, get involved in a crime, it threatens to change the course of their lives. Having a stellar cast that includes leads Jaideep Ahlawat, Zeeshan Ayyub, Tina Desai, and Shruti Sheth, ‘Bloody Brothers’ is a series that will keep you on the edge of your seat with nail-biting plot twists. The web series is directed by the renowned Shaad Ali and produced by Applause Entertainment and BBC Studios. It delivers the excitement and humour that every binge-watcher craves. 

Enjoy the Dark Comedy 'Bloody Brothers' on ZEE5 Today!

As a six-part web series, the intrigue and tension in ‘Bloody Brothers’ are what makes the series so compelling to watch. From confronting complicated relationships to covering up a crime, the series draws audiences with an engrossing style and tone. You can now watch ‘Bloody Brothers’ comfortably from your home on ZEE5. So, curl up on your sofa and get ready to watch an engaging binge on ZEE5!

items.title: Zee News
items.seo_description: With ZEE5, get access to Zee News, one of the most prestigious and awarded Hindi-language news channel that brings you the news that matters. Zee News offers the latest regional, national and international news of the day and provides up-to-date information on current events. Zee News delivers 360-degree coverage across all the genres including politics, sports, entertainment and much more.

items.title: Zee Business
items.seo_description:
Zee Business News

In the world of ambiguity and uncertainty, navigating through the business world requires factual data and information. This is why Zee Business News brings you the latest updates and developments of the business and financial world on your screens. Founded in 2004, Zee Business News Live has revolutionized the way we consume Hindi business news by covering a myriad of topics ranging from personal finance to international financial markets to help you accelerate your business knowledge.  

The channel focuses on enhancing your business acumen and understanding of the global markets through well-curated and informative segments, hard-hitting discussions, and real-time news updates. There are also segments dedicated to educating the viewers about the Indian stock market and the global market trends. As a pioneering Hindi business news channel, it aims to inform and empower viewers through 24/7 live coverage and sharp business journalism. 

Embrace a Business Mindset With Live Hindi Business News Updates

With a team of experienced news leaders and editors, Zee Business Live TV has relentlessly been at the forefront of covering key news stories and trending business topics from all over the globe. The channel is home to many popular business segments such as Corporate Radar, Bazar Aaj Aur Kal, India 360, and more. You can also browse through top headlines and exclusive interviews with esteemed leaders and business personalities. Whether you need tips for managing personal finances or want insights into the current market conditions, Zee Business News Live is India’s most trustworthy Hindi news network. 

If you want to uncover recent business and financial trends and develop actionable insights, you can catch live updates from Zeebiz Live on ZEE5.ZEE5 brings comfort and flexibility to your online streaming experience and ensures that you are up-to-date with the latest news on your phone or tablet.

items.title: ABP NEWS
DD India
items.description: Get all your news, infotainment, and international entertainment!

items.title: News24
items.description: News24 Live Channel.
items.short_description: News24 Live Channel.
items.seo_description:
Watch News24 Live for Round-the-Clock Hindi News

News24 is a Hindi-language news channel broadcasting updates about regional, national, and international events and issues. Launched back in 2007, the channel is operated by the BAG Media Group and successfully captures the imagination of its urban and local viewers. With the motto of 'Think First', News24 believes in inquisitive journalism and curates value-added content to engage and inspire its audience. items.title: Fingertip
items.description: Fingertip is a 2019 ZEE5 Tamil Original thriller series starring Akshara Haasan, Ashwin Kakumanu, Gayathri, and Sunaina. This anthology series showcases the negative impacts of social media, and how negative emotions like greed, revenge, and jealousy can force you to succumb to social pressure. The lives of Priya, Rekha, Sandhya, Krishnamoorthy, and Sanjay turn upside down due to one social media post. Enjoy this drama that is an eerie reminder of the destructive power of apps, according to cinemaexpress.com, only on ZEE5.

items.title: Jersey
items.description: Jersey is a 2019 Telugu sports drama movie starring Nani, Shraddha Srinath, Sanusha and Sathyaraj. The story revolves around Arjun, a talented cricket player, who quits playing after he fails to get selected to the Indian cricket team because of internal politics. Ten years later, still without a job, the 36-year-old Arjun decides to start playing cricket again and make it to the Indian team, mostly for his son. In spite of his age, Arjun manages to get selected to the Ranji team. Will Arjun manage to find a spot in the Indian cricket team? Will his dream of playing for the country come true?

items.seo_description:
Sunflower Web Series

Sunflower is a crime-thriller comedy series which narrates the story of a mysterious murder that takes place in Sunflower society. From thrill, comedy and drama centered around the characters with their relatable stories, everything revolving around the housing society promises to take you on a roller-coaster ride of entertainment.

ZEE5’s Sunflower has been written and directed by National award winner Vikas Bahl alongside Rahul Sengupta. The series stars comedian-turned-actor, Sunil Grover in the lead role with other actors like Ranvir Shorey, Mukul Chadda, and Girish Kulkarni also playing important characters.

Subscribe & watch Sunflower full web series in HD on ZEE5 with the option to save and download the episode with a simple click and watch it later, even without an internet connection.

items.description: Two brothers Jaggi and Daljeet run over an old man while driving home late one night. They do everything to cover their tracks, but when people begin to suspect, their lives fall apart.

items.seo_description:
Tighten Your Seatbelts for a Thrilling Ride with Bloody Brothers!

A gripping story with a hint of dark comedy and thriller, ‘Bloody Brothers’ is a tale that tests the relationship between two brothers. When Jaggi Grover and Daljeet Grover, two brothers, get involved in a crime, it threatens to change the course of their lives. Having a stellar cast that includes leads Jaideep Ahlawat, Zeeshan Ayyub, Tina Desai, and Shruti Sheth, ‘Bloody Brothers’ is a series that will keep you on the edge of your seat with nail-biting plot twists. The web series is directed by the renowned Shaad Ali and produced by Applause Entertainment and BBC Studios. It delivers the excitement and humour that every binge-watcher craves. 

Enjoy the Dark Comedy 'Bloody Brothers' on ZEE5 Today!

As a six-part web series, the intrigue and tension in ‘Bloody Brothers’ are what makes the series so compelling to watch. From confronting complicated relationships to covering up a crime, the series draws audiences with an engrossing style and tone. You can now watch ‘Bloody Brothers’ comfortably from your home on ZEE5. So, curl up on your sofa and get ready to watch an engaging binge on ZEE5!

items.title: Mithya
items.description: A tale of two women who are at odds with each other over allegations of plagiarism, which sparks a series of hostilities and shocking revelations spun around a murder for which they both are suspects.
items.short_description: A tale of two women who are at odds with each other over allegations of plagiarism, which sparks a series of hostilities and shocking revelations spun around a murder for which they both are suspects.
items.seo_description:
Prepare to Sit on the Edge of Your Seat with Mithya on ZEE5!

A gripping story featuring two strong female characters, ‘Mithya’ is a psychological thriller drama starring Huma Qureshi and Avantika Dassani. The web series is directed by Rohan Sippy, the talented director who cemented his name in Indian cinema with hits like ‘Dum Maro Dum’ and ‘Nautanki Saala’. An original adaptation of the 2019 British Series ‘Cheat’, Mithya is set in the beautiful valleys of Darjeeling with a plot that will keep you guessing till the end.

Watch the Latest Huma Qureshi Thriller ‘Mithya’ on ZEE5!

An engaging six-part thriller drama, Mithya marks the debut of the talented Avantika Dassani and features Parambrata Chatterjee, Rajit Kapur and Samir Soni in pivotal roles. The series navigates the complex relationship between Juhi and Rhea, played by Huma Qureshi and Avantika Dassani. What begins as an argument between a student and professor over plagiarism quickly spirals out of control and leads to shocking revelations. 

Decode the Mystery of What’s Real with Mithya on ZEE5!

Bringing a thought-provoking drama starring the talent powerhouse ‘Huma Qureshi’, Mithya web series is your next binge-fix. From finding the truth to exploring the complex characters, the series will keep you on the edge of your seat with its sudden twists and turns. The best thing is that you can enjoy streaming the latest episodes of Mithya web series online on ZEE5.

items.seo_description:
Watch the Heart-Warming Tale of Family Bond with 'Sutliyan'

'Sutliyan' is a ZEE5 Original web series produced by Manor Rama Pictures and directed by the talented Shree Narayan Singh. The series tells the tale of a family who reunites weeks before 'Diwali' and embarks on a journey to heal their past emotional trauma. The show features a stellar cast with Ayesha Raza Mishra, Plabita Borthakur, Shiv Panditt, and Vivaan Shah in the leads. At its heart, the compelling narrative is laced with deep-seated emotions and humour that will make you laugh, cry, and reunite with your family.

Spend Quality Time with Slice of Life Drama 'Sutliyan' on ZEE5!

As a slice of life drama, 'Sutliyan' deals with real issues and the complexities of family relationships. The meaningful context coupled with entertainment elements makes the show relatable and binge-worthy. The gripping plot of the series will reel you in from the start and keep you invested in the character’s emotional and spiritual journey till the end.

 

If you are on the lookout for emotionally fulfilling shows, 'Sutliyan' is a warm drama with relatable characters that will help you realize the importance of family. Now, you can binge-watch all the episodes of 'Sutliyan' from anywhere in the world on ZEE5. So, give yourself a break from the monotony of your routine and watch the refreshing drama 'Sutliyan' across multiple devices on ZEE5.

State of Siege Temple Attack zee5 original movie
items.description: Inspired by true events, this ZEE5 Original film narrates the heroic tale of the NSG commandos who step in to save innocent people when terrorists enter a temple in Gujarat and attack them.State Of Siege: Temple Attack is Akshaye Khanna’s OTT debut where he leads a team of NSG Commandos as Major Hanut Singh. Will he be able to successfully rescue all hostages from the temple? To find out, watch SOS: Temple Attack, an edge-of-your-seat thriller.If patriotic and action movies intrigue you like many others, you should surely watch State of Siege: Temple Attack film for experiencing the siege first-hand like no one else.
